price: Dan kalau Kami menghendaki, niscaya Kami akan berikan kepada tiap-tiap jiwa petunjuk (bagi)nya, akan tetapi telah tetaplah perkataan dari pada-Ku, "Sesungguhnya akan Aku penuhi neraka jahanam itu dengan jin dan manusia bersama-sama.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَأٓتَيۡنَا كُلَّ نَفۡسٍ هُدَىٰهَا وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنِّي لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā laātaynā kulla nafsin hudāhā walākin ḥaqqa al-qawlu minnī la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
